sentences.english: The more school friends, the higher the GPA.
sentences.chinese: 校内朋友越多，平均分数越高。

sentences.english: Students who already have on-campus housing arranged may not seek off-campus accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 已安排校内住宿者，不得私自在校外租房住宿。

sentences.english: We are planning on practicing fire drills next week.

sentences.english: We are having several intramural athletic competition events in the next two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 在未来的一两周，校内有各种不同的运动比赛。

sentences.english: Since that day, I can hardly log in Xiaonei .
sentences.chinese: 从那天起，我几乎不能登录校内网。

sentences.english: Three Rivers campus facilities in a complete, fully functional.
sentences.chinese: 三河一中校内设施齐全，功能完备。

sentences.english: I live in a residence off campus and I've already changed roommates twice this year.
sentences.chinese: 我住校内公寓的，今年已经换过两次室友了。

sentences.english: I got this site from a share in Xiaonei.
sentences.chinese: 这是个在校内上看到的分享的一个网站。

sentences.english: It is forbidden to set up a stall on campus without permission.
sentences.chinese: 未经同意，不得在校内摆摊设点。

sentences.english: The teacher education and training of the source is limited in the campus, not open horizon.
sentences.chinese: 对教育和培训的师源仅局限在校内，眼界不够开阔。

sentences.english: Intramurals are so much fun and so many people get into them, eachseason/semester.
sentences.chinese: 每个学期，校内都有很多好玩的事，也有很多人参加。
